channel.title: Notebook on Asaf Shakarzy
channel.description: Recent content in Notebook on Asaf Shakarzy

item.title: My Notebook
item.description: My current notebook is Macbook Pro 15” I was a fan of the Thinkpad (T series) for more than 10 years, Back in 2016, when Apple came with the Macbook Pro 15” retina version I decided to give it a try. Since then I stick with Macbook (I already upgraded once to 2017 revision) Here are my pros of Thinkpad and the Macbook Pro. Lenovo Pros: It is a modular machine, you can easily swap drive, memory, etc.
